description: This table contains the Proration related information from the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the coverage record on the hospital account.

columns.name: EXP_COINS_PC
columns.description: This column stores the expected coinsurance percentage.

columns.name: EXP_COINS_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the expected coinsurance amount.

columns.name: EXP_DED_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the expected deductible amount.

columns.name: SYS_EXP_COPAY_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the copay amount expected by the system.
